Pre-Game Insights: Roberto Martinez has made his feelings known ahead of Portugal v Georgia, demanding action amid spectators attempting to get photos with superstar Cristiano Ronaldo.
Post-Match Reflections: Martinez voiced his own concerns about pitch invasions, stating that it's 'dangerous and it's not good for football'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A young fan made it onto the pitch during the Selecao's Euro 2024 win against Turkey and took a selfie with Ronaldo. Several others then evaded the attention of stewards to enter the field of play, with five making it on in total.
Others: Portugal are back in action on Wednesday, taking on Georgia in their final group game. Martinez will have the luxury of rotating his squad, with the weekend victory securing top spot in Group F, but Ronaldo could yet receive minutes as he looks for his first goal of the tournament.
